ğŸ—’ï¸ Latest Data Version: November 2023 

Ensure that you are choosing the most suitable and widely followed topics.

On the story settings page, it will tell you your potential audience reach and suggest related tags. 

Regular version (FREE FOR LIFE): Contains 84 topics - all topics with over one million followers, and those that were previously marked as 'Top Writer' topics.

â­Upgrade to the Professional version! â­ You have invested in the Medium platform, and now you can invest in ensuring that you have exactly the right topics for your story. Covering more than 800 topics so you can pinpoint the exact audience that you are looking for.

âš ï¸âš ï¸âš ï¸ 
Please be aware that the evaluation of the topics will only work if you are logged into your Medium.com account, AND you are on the Story's settings page.  On any other page, you may browse and research the list of available topics.
âš ï¸âš ï¸âš ï¸

FEATURES:
 ã€°ï¸ Regular version ã€°ï¸ 
âœ… A list of the 'Top Writer' topics and topics with over 1,000,000 followers containing details of the number of followers, stories, and writers.
âœ… Search, filter, and sort topics so that you can choose the correct one.
âœ… Evaluate the topics that you have added to your story to see what the possible audience reach would be.
âœ… Browse and filter related and recommended topics based on the current topics on your page.

 â­ Professional version â­
In addition to the regular versionâ€¦
âœ… Contains over 900 topics - all the topics with over 1,000 followers containing details of the number of followers, stories, and writers.
âœ… For topics that have less than 1000 followers - suggestions are made for better topics
âœ… See inspiration for your writing, targeting topics that have the greatest growth, or need more stories or writers.
